summary: A bit of a face-lift for the College of Winterhold's courtyard.
descriptionHtml:
Have you ever been to the College of Winterhold and thought, 'This is nice, but it lacks a certain flair!' then this is the mod for you! Â I (MrRedMarshmallow) have made some simple, yet quite effective additions to the courtyard of the College of Winterhold that adds a whole new atmosphere to the lovely mage school! Now, you can study in the quiet sitting area, admire the beautiful flora of the Botanical Walkway, or possibly attend a lecture in the new Lecture Area! The College has never looked so beautiful.

If you're wondering, then yes, this is Lore-Friendly. I only upload Lore-Friendly mods. Maybe you are thinking, 'If the Nords dislike the Mages so much, then maybe that's why the College was so bare in the first place!' Well in my opinion, the Mages are much more crafty and would never need the permission of the Nords to make a beautiful place for magic students to study! So yes, this mod is Lore-Friendly and the best part is that it does [i]not [/i]require any other mods or DLC to work! Just the Vanilla Skyrim! Enjoy!
author: MrRedMarshmallow
